member.name: M:Enterprise.Library.Core.Extensions.ListExtensions.AddRange``1(System.Collections.Generic.IList{``0},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Adds the elements of the specified collection to the end of the .
member.param: The list to which elements will be added. Must not be null.
The collection of elements to add to the list. Must not be null.
member.exception: Thrown if either or is null.
Thrown if is an array, as arrays cannot be resized.
member.remarks: If is an instance of , this method uses the more efficient .AddRange method. If not, it adds items one by one using .Add method. This method does not support adding items to arrays as they are fixed size.
